message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $160.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I really like the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering you the product for $145. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $135. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'm offering you the product for $138. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $132.50. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're trying to get to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm offering you the product for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm getting close to my target price, but I'm still a bit off. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $130. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering you the product for $132. It's the best I can do, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I've reached my limit and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'll offer $129.99. This is my final offer.
